Comment: I think this underscores just how much biased left mainstream publications have lost influence. They got rid of any sense of covering both sides and went all in lying for their candidates, thinking this would help their candidates win. And not only did their candidates fail, but also their extreme bias has cost them credibility and relevance. One would think the leftist echo chambers on Reddit might learn a lesson and include and understand the importance of opposition voices. Those voices make you better. The competition of ideas propels us all higher.
